title: Test Kiro Integration
description: Verify that the Kiro worker can successfully generate code and create pull requests for AI-assisted development workflows in the AIPM system.
iWant: to verify that the Kiro worker can successfully generate code and create pull requests
soThat: AI-assisted development workflows function correctly in the AIPM system
acceptanceCriteria: Given a code generation task in DynamoDB queue, when Kiro worker polls the queue, then it should pick up the task within 1 second
Given a valid task, when Kiro worker processes it, then it should checkout the correct PR branch and generate appropriate code
Given generated code, when Kiro worker completes processing, then it should commit changes and update task status to completed
